titles.title: President George H. W. Bush and Barbara Bush Dollar Coin Act

To amend title 31, United States Code, to require $1 coins issued during 2019 to honor President George H. W. Bush and to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to issue bullion coins during 2019 in honor of Barbara Bush.
President George H. W. Bush and Barbara Bush Dollar Coin Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
President George H. W. Bush and Barbara Bush Dollar Coin Act
This bill requires the issuance of
$1 coins bearing the image of President George H.W. Bush for a one-year period beginning on January 1, 2019, and bullion coins bearing the image of Barbara Bush during that same period.
